DOC.criteria: Patients must histologic diagnosis ovarian , fallopian tube , primary peritoneal carcinoma per pretreatment biopsy laparoscopy , interventional radiology , paracentesis , CT guide core biopsy . Histologic documentation original primary tumor require via pathology report . Patients must adequate : Renal function : Glomerular Filtration Rate ( GFR ) > 30 ; Gastrointestinal absorption : No underlie malabsorption syndrome ( i.e . inflammatory bowel disease , celiac disease ) Ability tolerate oral medication Patients take vitamin D time enrollment without diagnosis vitamin D deficiency Patients childbearing potential must negative pregnancy test prior study entry practice effective form contraception . If applicable , patient must discontinue breastfeed prior study entry . Patients must least 18 year old Patients know preexist diagnosis vitamin D deficiency . Patients renal disease GFR < 30 Patients primary hyperparathyroidism Patients invasive malignancy , exception nonmelanoma skin cancer . Patients concomitant endometrial cancer diagnose time ovarian cancer allow participate endometrial cancer International Federation Gynecology Obstetrics stage 1B less .
